stimulusHtml: Which of the following developments was most directly connected to the collapse of the Whig Party in United States politics during the 1850s?
choicesHtml: The escalation of tensions between proslavery and antislavery factions
Abraham Lincolnâ€™s debates with Stephen Douglas over popular sovereignty
The rejection of Manifest Destiny by a growing percentage of American people
Disagreement over the constitutionality of federal internal improvements funding
